name: Touching Grass Simulator (raffaelc2)
description:
---About The Game---

Touching Grass Simulator is a Game where you touch grass, then you get enough times of you having touched grass to buy multipliers for yourself!!

---Requirements---

2GB of Ram (For the game to run smoothly) 

A mouse 

Clicker Game Skills

x32 Operating System (At least) 

Windows 8 or Higher

---Notes---

Note: Keep in mind, this is not completely finished, we will add updates sometimes, and we'll make it paid so get this game as quick as you can!

---Credits---

Coding by raffaelc2 (Me)

Music By Toby Fox, Spice and The Living Tombstone
